# MTLGPUFamily.macCatalyst2

**Case**

Represents a family 2 Mac GPU when running an app you built with Mac Catalyst.

## Declaration

```swift
case macCatalyst2
```

## Checking for Mac Catalyst family GPU support

- **MTLGPUFamily.macCatalyst1**: Represents a family 1 Mac GPU when running an app you built with Mac Catalyst.
